introduction.text: Writerey is a tool that aims to help you to organize, compose and refine your stories. No matter if you write poems, novels, short stories or something else, writerey is your distraction free place to get work done.

beta.title: Still in Beta
beta.intro: Please be aware that writerey is a community-driven open source project that is still in beta. That especially means:
points: Some features are missing or incomplete
Changes could lead to backward incompatibility, even though we try our best to avoid that
beta.v1hint: That said, writerey is in a useable state and can already add value to your daily work. We would appreciate your feedback highly. Developing a software is a long journey and we would be delighted if you tag along. If you prefer a comfortable and stable 1.0, we hope to see you again on a later date.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text: Do you want to find out more about writerey or search for a place to get started? Head over to our documentation!

get.opensource: Writerey is an open source tool and completely free to use.
